results.content:
Just what is needed. Getting the basics re-organised and strengthened, Wappler is partially auto-didact and partially intuitive covering a hell of a lot of skills. 
I was getting overwhelmed -- at long last we are starting at the bottom and working up.
The right pace and the right content-- why was this not done before and made easily available? 
Strongly recommended

results.content: This course is excellent. I've learned a lot and now feel more confidence giving a try to develop my application using Wappler! One more thing, it'd be much more helpful if the course could cover some real-world projects. Thank you.
